projects.name: Duxter App
projects.company: for Duxter, Inc Seattle, WA - USA

imgs.legend: The authentication page and its parallax effect
The newsfeed of the connected user
It is possible to reply to a post and to like/dislike it
The user can share a post
The app handles notifications
Using the app, the user can set some personal parameters

projects.description:
Developed the Duxter mobile application on Android and iOS. Duxter is a social network for gamers. The application provides mandy features such as the newsfeed, account manage-ment, and notifications.

► Download the iOS app
► Download the Android app

projects.name: Enterprise Resources Manager

imgs.legend: The dashboard of a project
The tasks list for each employee/project
The employees Calendar
Each employee manage his activities reports
The project leader can set the project workload

projects.description: Developed, designed and deployed a web application for managing projects and tasks in the company. It fulfilled all the company’s needs and also featured an interface for customers.

projects.name: Cross Reference Finder

imgs.legend: The home page displays the six main company's products line
User has to choose the competitor and enter the product reference
If the reference was incomplete, the application shows propositions
User can choose the importance of each criteria
Finally, the application shows the best Schneider Electric's equivalent products

projects.description: Developed a business web application and modeled a database for the study of cross-references. It has been deployed to all the company’s offices worldwide.

projects.name: Farmers
projects.title: Multiplayer Online Game - 2013

imgs.legend: Coming soon!

projects.description:
An online multiplayer game where you play a farmer who cultivates crops, sells his harvests and attacks the other players to extend his territory.

► Play soon!
► Source code on Github soon!

projects.name: Topological Sort

imgs.legend: The single page application
Some items added with their dependencies
The result showing the items ordered according to the topological sort algorithm
An error raised by the algorithm

projects.description:
A web application of the topological sort. It uses Backbone.js to build the UI and includes unit tests written with Mocha.

► Try it
► Source code on Github

projects.name: Complete Blog Template

imgs.legend: The home page with the latest blog posts
The interface to create a new post
The interface to add a comment to a post with fields validation
